name: 2024 10th International Conference on Control, Automation and Robotics
content: IEEE Conference Proceedings: Accepted and presented papers will be published in IEEE Conference Proceedings, included in IEEE Xplore, and indexed by Ei Compendex, Scopus, etc. ICCAR 2024 was included in IEEE official upcoming conference list: https://conferences.ieee.org/conferences\_events/conferences/conferencedetails/61844
organizers: Singapore Institute of Electronics, IEEE Robotics and Automation Society and IEEE
